questions.quote: Oh, because I was thinking, the semester's over; you're not my teacher anymore.
I'm sorry, I don't believe contestants are allowed to talk to each other.
No, no, Carol. There's nothing wrong with it. I just, I just don't think breast milk is for adults.
You know, actually that's not a bad idea. I can do it out of my apartment. I don't think my mom would mind.
Monica, if you get five cool points, you get to make somebody take off one item of clothing. It hasn't happened yet, but we're all very excited.
Aren't you afraid that Joey's going to figure all of this out? I heard it.
Oh no, I already packed. The only thing I couldn't find though was your Speedo.
I'm hungry. Wanna get some pizza? You can keep yelling if there's more.
I also got this great salt and pepper shaker from the restaurant.
Pathetic mess? I know, butcome on, man, she's needy, she's vulnerable. I'm thinkin', cha-ching! Thanks. Look, you have not been out with a woman since Janice. You're doin' this.
